feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.7: Fix Broken Docker Container; Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

As reported in #3037, the Docker container was failing to boot. This release should resolve that issue. Thanks for reporting all!

:rocket: Features

  • Fix Broken Container and Other Dockerfile Improvements (#2981) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump unicode-display_width from 2.6.0 to 3.1.4 (#3020) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump terminal-table from 3.0.2 to 4.0.0 (#3019) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump language_server-protocol from 3.17.0.3 to 3.17.0.4 (#3022) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.178.0 to 1.179.0 (#3030) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump overcommit from 0.65.0 to 0.66.0 (#3031) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 (#3035) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.217.0 to 3.217.1 (#3034) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 (#3029) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump digest-crc from 0.6.5 to 0.7.0 (#3028) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump puma from 6.5.0 to 6.6.0 (#3027) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump overcommit from 0.64.1 to 0.65.0 (#3024) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1042.0 to 1.1043.0 (#3023) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.37.0 to 1.38.0 (#3021) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 (#3017) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.29.0 to 2.29.1 (#3018) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.216.1 to 3.217.0 (#3016) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.216.0 to 3.216.1 (#3011) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.12.2 to 1.13.0 (#3010) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.15.0 to 1.15.1 (#3009) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1040.0 to 1.1041.0 (#3008) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.14.3 to 1.15.0 (#3007) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump helm/chart-testing-action from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 (#3002) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump terser from 1.2.4 to 1.2.5 (#3001) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump erb_lint from 0.7.0 to 0.9.0 (#3000) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.18.1 to 1.18.2 (#2998) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump psych from 5.2.2 to 5.2.3 (#2997) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1039.0 to 1.1040.0 (#2995) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.28.0 to 2.29.0 (#2994) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.50.7

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.12: Light/Dark Theme Switching Fix

:memo: What’s Changed

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.13: Expiring File Download Links & Better Session Reset
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

When a push contains attached files:

  • Unique download links are generated each time the push is viewed
  • Each file download link expires after 5 minutes
  • A countdown timer shows the remaining time until expiration

  • Time Limited Download Links (#2617) @pglombardo
  • Delete session cookie and reset session on logout. (#2903) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Reconstitute "stable" tag in git (#3072) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1048.0 to 1.1049.0 (#3070) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump json from 2.9.1 to 2.10.1 (#3069) @dependabot[bot]
  • Bump esbuild from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 (#3067) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 6.2.2 to 7.0.0 (#2951) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]
